replies.msg:
Not 50M = 50M transfer fee players
50M = 50M amortised transfer fee + salary increase

So take Mesut Ozil. He cost the club about £45m, and signed a 5 year deal. So his transfer fee was spread across 5 years, resulting in his yearly cost impacting on the budget by just £9m.

(Ozil amortised transfer fee = 45M/5 = 9M)

This summer that original 5 year deal comes to an end. Ozil is paid up. That would actually give us an additional £9m a year within our current accounts to spend on a player. But we spent that £9m in January on Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.

(Auba amortised transfer fee = ~9M)

In Arsenal’s history, we have only had a net transfer spend above £50m twice. So if the new manager is given £50 to spend, that is not the bad starting point that many make up.

ie if arteta can spend up to 50M amortised transfer fee = almost more than wenger every year

replies.msg: 沙比岩岩先讀完個課程，阿迪達已經贏在起跑線了

So we fast forward to this summer. We have established that we can increase the clubs outgoing by about £50m. £15m will be take up by wages, so what does the remaining £35m get you?

Straight off the bat, we could buy a £20m centre back on a 4 year deal – that is the figure quoted for Borussia Dortmund’s Sokratis (I am not going to attempt to spell his surname). £20m over 4 years will cost the club £5m a year.

We could then sign Jean Michael Serri. He reportedly has a £40m release clause. Hand him another 4 year deal. That works out at £10m a year I the accounts.

So we have “spent” £60m in two players, yet the impact on the budget is just £15m. Still leaves us with £20m.

We could then go big. £50m on a goalkeeper. Give him a 5 year deal. True cost is £10m.

That leaves us with £10m to play with. For that we could go out and get 2 £25m players and hand them a 5 year deal. Or sign someone like Max Meyer on free, leaving us able to spend another £50m spread over 5 years.

So let’s list what Arsenal could actually sign within their £50m budget

1x £50m player on a 5 year deal

1x £40m player on a 4 year deal

1x £25m player on a 5 year deal

1x £25m player on a 5 year deal

1x £20m player on a 4 year deal


（It was assumed by the author that cazorla ospina mertesecker perez campbell out + we buy 5 players and the increase in wage = 15M)

£160m outlay on players, yet it will only increase our yearly outgoings by £50m. It is within the budget.

And this does not even include any profit we make from players sold. We could easily raise a further £20m just in the sale of Ospina, Jenkinson, Perez & Campbell.

The reality is, once fully explained, having a pre-sales budget of £50m is actually more than sufficient.l

Alisher Usmanov linked with Everton again

Evertonians have long been excited about potential investment in the club by Russian billionaire Alisher Usmanov.

The Uzbek-born business magnate is a long-term business partner of Toffees majority shareholder Farhad Moshiri, with both men combining to purchase a stake in Arsenal in 2007.

Moshiri subsequently sold his Gunners shares in order to buy into Everton two years ago, leaving Usmanov with a 30% stake.

Ever since there has been talk of Moshiri being joined at Goodison Park by Usmanov, whose net worth is believed to be around $15 billion.

The following year one of Usmanov’s companies, USM, signed a five-year naming rights deal with Everton’s Finch Farm training ground.

quote.msg:
So we fast forward to this summer. We have established that we can increase the clubs outgoing by about £50m. £15m will be take up by wages, so what does the remaining £35m get you?

Straight off the bat, we could buy a £20m centre back on a 4 year deal – that is the figure quoted for Borussia Dortmund’s Sokratis (I am not going to attempt to spell his surname). £20m over 4 years will cost the club £5m a year.

We could then sign Jean Michael Serri. He reportedly has a £40m release clause. Hand him another 4 year deal. That works out at £10m a year I the accounts.

So we have “spent” £60m in two players, yet the impact on the budget is just £15m. Still leaves us with £20m.

We could then go big. £50m on a goalkeeper. Give him a 5 year deal. True cost is £10m.

That leaves us with £10m to play with. For that we could go out and get 2 £25m players and hand them a 5 year deal. Or sign someone like Max Meyer on free, leaving us able to spend another £50m spread over 5 years.

So let’s list what Arsenal could actually sign within their £50m budget

1x £50m player on a 5 year deal

1x £40m player on a 4 year deal

1x £25m player on a 5 year deal

1x £25m player on a 5 year deal

1x £20m player on a 4 year deal


（It was assumed by the author that cazorla ospina mertesecker perez campbell out + we buy 5 players and the increase in wage = 15M)

£160m outlay on players, yet it will only increase our yearly outgoings by £50m. It is within the budget.

And this does not even include any profit we make from players sold. We could easily raise a further £20m just in the sale of Ospina, Jenkinson, Perez & Campbell.

The reality is, once fully explained, having a pre-sales budget of £50m is actually more than sufficient.l

LACAZETTE: GOAL DROUGHT GOT INTO MY HEAD


Alexandre Lacazette says he became weighed down with a lack of confidence when he went through a goal drought that lasted ten games in the middle of the season.

The French striker scored just one goal in 14 games, and subsequently underwent surgery for a knee problem that may have been a contributory factor to his lack of form.

Speaking to L’Equipe [full translation here via GFFN), he took full responsibility for it, but admitted he found it a burden as it was not something he’d experienced previously in his career.

“I had never experienced that,” he said. At night, when I would go home, I would repeat to myself, “Come on, next time it’ll go in!” But it didn’t. And I’d only realised this after five or six matches.

“Suddenly, I started asking myself, “How long has it been since I last scored a goal?” It started to bother me.

“I don’t know how the other strikers manage, but personally, it got to my head. I couldn’t blame anyone, it was all from me.

“I couldn’t blame the coach because he was giving me my chance on the field. I couldn’t blame my teammates since chances were being created.

“It was just me.”

quote.msg:
LACAZETTE: GOAL DROUGHT GOT INTO MY HEAD


Alexandre Lacazette says he became weighed down with a lack of confidence when he went through a goal drought that lasted ten games in the middle of the season.

The French striker scored just one goal in 14 games, and subsequently underwent surgery for a knee problem that may have been a contributory factor to his lack of form.

Speaking to L’Equipe [full translation here via GFFN), he took full responsibility for it, but admitted he found it a burden as it was not something he’d experienced previously in his career.

“I had never experienced that,” he said. At night, when I would go home, I would repeat to myself, “Come on, next time it’ll go in!” But it didn’t. And I’d only realised this after five or six matches.

“Suddenly, I started asking myself, “How long has it been since I last scored a goal?” It started to bother me.

“I don’t know how the other strikers manage, but personally, it got to my head. I couldn’t blame anyone, it was all from me.

“I couldn’t blame the coach because he was giving me my chance on the field. I couldn’t blame my teammates since chances were being created.

“It was just me.”

杜慈亮相 PSG無意斟雲加任總監

【now.com體育】杜慈周日首次以巴黎聖日耳門主帥身份會見傳聞，與此同時，球會會主否認擬斟雲加出任總監一職

於上周落實獲委任為PSG新帥的杜慈（Thomas Tuchel），這天亮相巴黎王子球場，這位44歲主帥以英語夾雜法語表達心情：「這是巴黎，是愛的城市，光明的城市。它也是浪漫的城市，一個冒險的城市。我希望球迷愛上這球隊，以及在這兒最亮眼的球員。」

他特別表示期待與首席球星尼馬合作，但又補充不會怯於一眾球星的名氣。

此外，該早前有指已離開阿仙奴的雲加，可能出任PSG體育總監，與他私交甚篤的PSG會長艾基拉菲矢言否認：「我不知他會幹甚麼，但他將會收到很多斟介，今天，PSG的體育總監是安迪路軒歷基，他會繼續幹下去。」
我比較想睇雲爺爺教國家隊

兩位外借西甲的浪人分別在西甲煞科取得入球

盧卡斯佩雷斯在拉科魯尼亞接近必然正選，季中一度經歷入球荒，最後埋單計數在西甲入八球，僅次首度射手阿祖安的九球，並交出六個助攻，可惜依然無法幫助球隊護級成功。

來季除非新領隊重新起用，否則來季離隊機會極大；已經盛傳拉素對佢虎視眈眈，準備先借後買，而球員本身亦唔抗拒加盟（因為隊內有其同鄉兼好友路爾斯阿拔圖）

至於祖爾甘寶今季備受傷患困擾，西甲只踢過兩場正選六場後備，只有兩個入球（煞科一戰更是唯一一次踢畢全場）。球員自己表明無意再返回阿仙奴，首選傾向留在西甲，尤其留在給予很多耐性的貝迪斯。不過目前先會集中注意力在備戰世界盃上。昨晚睇足甘仔的表現，雖然狀態唔fit，多次傳失及較個人主義，但入球時的冷靜和偶爾的靈光傳送仍具威脅，不過都無助球隊大部分時間打多一人下都要輸波而回。幸好，無損球隊能晉身下季歐霸盃賽事。

至於其他外借的一隊球員命運都較不佳。馬天尼斯外借基達菲長居後備（只有五場聯賽和兩場盃賽正選）；淺野拓磨在史特加新教頭接手後完全失去機會；贊堅遜和在伯明翰同樣不受重用。JRA在昂熱則是輪換球員，睇網上評價則一般；反而艾邦外借至比甲的中游份子聖圖爾登發揮唔錯，攻入5球。

想找一個較成功如上季的柏芝能從外借汲取足夠經驗的例子極少。希望來季的外借政策能為球員爭取得更好（雖然也要球員本身爭氣與否）

傑出阿仙奴 Excellent Arsenal

〔即時新聞／綜合報導］美國一名21歲的火辣女教師被指控和一名未成年男學生在家做愛，該女教師被以美金5萬元（約台幣149.8萬元）交保，此案將在下月4日開庭審理。

綜合外媒報導，佛林特（Elizabeth Flint）先前在伊利諾州東葛蘭巴中學（Glenbard East High School）擔任實習教師，年僅21歲的她熱愛運動、個性外向。而當局指出，佛林特在今年4月帶了一名未成年學生到家中做愛，又和這名未成年學生發生2次性行為，隨後因佛林特與這名男同學的互動詭異，令其他教職人員起疑，通報校方後才揭露醜聞。

伊利諾州杜佩奇郡（DuPage County）檢察官針對此事件表示，這「十分噁心」，強調佛林特利用學生對自己的信任和自身權威立場，性侵犯未成年學生三次，行為可惡，不能容忍。

傳阿迪達今周入主阿仙奴

【now.com體育】留意！有傳阿仙奴在今個星期內公佈，由前隊長阿迪達接過帥印。

執教22年的雲加離開後，阿仙奴積極尋找接班人，而且已從多名心水人選之中，刪減至只得4人，分別是阿迪達（Mikel Arteta）、安歷基、安察洛堤、路維；不過路維早前已宣佈跟德國國家隊續約，因此肯定不會來投。

根據英國《鏡報》報道，兵工廠近日跟前隊長、現任曼城助教的阿迪達多次會談，而且雙方亦已就合作取得共識，將於今個星期內公佈。行政總裁加迪斯認為，36歲的阿迪達最適合球會的少帥政策。

阿迪達入主之後，將有5000萬鎊資金去擴軍。至於即將約滿的中場韋舒亞，雖然備受愛華頓、狼隊、AC米蘭、祖雲達斯青睞，但有指會因為阿迪達執教而決定留隊並續約3年。

Unai Emery emerges as shock late contender to be Arsenal boss but Mikel Arteta remains favourite

Unai Emery has emerged as a shock last-minute candidate to take over as the new Arsenal manager.

Mikel Arteta, currently assistant to Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola, has been the favourite to land the job having been endorsed by the departing Arsene Wenger.

But the availability of Spaniard Emery, 46, who left Paris Saint-Germain after leading the French side to the Ligue 1 title, has alerted the powers at Arsenal.

傳阿迪達今周入主阿仙奴

【now.com體育】留意！有傳阿仙奴在今個星期內公佈，由前隊長阿迪達接過帥印。

執教22年的雲加離開後，阿仙奴積極尋找接班人，而且已從多名心水人選之中，刪減至只得4人，分別是阿迪達（Mikel Arteta）、安歷基、安察洛堤、路維；不過路維早前已宣佈跟德國國家隊續約，因此肯定不會來投。

根據英國《鏡報》報道，兵工廠近日跟前隊長、現任曼城助教的阿迪達多次會談，而且雙方亦已就合作取得共識，將於今個星期內公佈。行政總裁加迪斯認為，36歲的阿迪達最適合球會的少帥政策。

阿迪達入主之後，將有5000萬鎊資金去擴軍。至於即將約滿的中場韋舒亞，雖然備受愛華頓、狼隊、AC米蘭、祖雲達斯青睞，但有指會因為阿迪達執教而決定留隊並續約3年。

replies.msg:
唔係真係5千萬下話
中游中堅都買唔到喎
